input.sentences: the baking date was fun for everyone .
they took time to take photos between mixing .
there were plenty of varieties of sweets to choose from .
a black and white photo was made to create a unique memory of the event .
output.sentences: One fun night, Marcy was preparing for a date while baking cookies for a party later.
She took some time to take photos of her roommate and date before mixing the eggs into the batter.
Her date stayed in the kitchen while people arrived for hours of fun.
Because of the varieties of people coming to eat her sweets, she made plenty of cookies and cakes.
Her white friends loved her unique baked goods and each wanted a photo with the genius baker.
